## OWebForm.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `OWebForm` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(_appContext: OWebApp, adapter: OWebFormAdapter, required?: string[], excluded?: string[], checkAll?: boolean, verbose?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_appContext | OWebApp | The app context. |
|  adapter | OWebFormAdapter | The form. |
|  required | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The required fields. |
|  excluded | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The fields to exclude from validation. |
|  checkAll | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> When true all fields will be validated. |
|  verbose | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Log warning. |
